snippet.title: Central Qld house fires suspicious: police
snippet.content: Fires which destroyed one Rockhampton home and damaged two others are being treated by police as suspicious. Emergency services were called to a Murray Street address before 5am on Monday where they found three buildings on fire. No one was home at the destroyed house and no one from the other homes were injured. Police are appealing to the public for information. (C) AAP 2017
